name: Alone
blurb: Alone is an immersive VR horror experience for the Oculus Rift. Can you make it to the end?

rewards.reward: Access to our backer only forums and a huge thanks from us at Greenwood Games!
Receive a digital copy of Alone. You also get access to our backer only forums.
Receive a digital copy of Alone, as well as an exclusive digital movie poster for the game! You also get access to our backer only forums.

Receive two digital copies of Alone to share with a friend! You'll also receive the exclusive digital movie poster AND a detailed digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour. You also get access to our backer only forums.

Now gives you access to an early DEMO BUILD - play the first 10 minutes of the game before it\u2019s released! We will also put your name in a \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d section of the credits, you will receive TWO copies of Alone and a digital copy of the Game Music. In addition you will receive the exclusive digital movie poster AND a detailed digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour. You also get access to our backer only forums!

You get a copy of NOT-SO-ALONE, an extra game where you can control the individual events of the haunting at your leisure! Not-So-Alone is a stand-alone (heh) sandbox that lets you control all the events in the original version with simple keystrokes. While your friends play in the Oculus Rift, control the sights and sounds of their adventure within the Alone living room! In addition, you will receive a digital copy of Alone, and all previous rewards!

Receive a digital art book featuring beautiful concepts and renders from the game. You'll also receive a digital copy of Alone, a digital movie poster based on the game, a digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour, and access to the backers only forums.

In addition to receiving a copy of Not-So-Alone, you\u2019ll also receive the Not-So-Alone SPECIAL EFFECTS\u201d pack - an assortment of extra special effects that have been custom made for your enjoyment while playing in Not-So-Alone! In addition, you will receive a digital copy of Alone and all previous tiers!

Receive a personalized postcard sent to you by the team! In addition you'll receive a digital copy of Alone, a digital movie poster based on the game, a digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour, access to the backers only forums,  and digital art book.
Your name in the opening credits as a PRODUCER and you can sit in on two planning calls with the Developers via Skype! In addition, you will receive a digital copy of Alone and all previous tiers!

Receive an exclusive backer only T-Shirt! In addition you'll receive a digital copy of Alone, a digital movie poster based on the game, a digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour, access to the backers only forums, digital art book, and personalized postcard.
Send us a photo of YOUR COUCH and we will send you a digital version to use in Alone and Not-So-Alone! In addition, you will receive a digital copy of Alone and all previous tiers!

Receive a hand-made crocheted plushie based on a character from The Witching Hour! In addition, you'll receive a digital copy of Alone, a digital movie poster based on the game, a digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour, access to the backers only forums, digital art book, personalized postcard, and an exclusive T-Shirt.

This tier lets you name one of the in-game characters using your gamertag (or the gamertag of your choice).

In addition, you will receive a digital copy of Alone, a digital movie poster based on the game, a digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour, access to the backers only forums, digital art book, personalized postcard, and an exclusive T-Shirt.

*The gamertag you choose must be appropriate, and within reason.

For the final tier, and the ultimate VR experience, we will recreate your living room for your very own custom game! Have the living room from the game replaced with your  own, making the Alone horror experience beyond immersive!\r\n\r\nReceive a digital copy of Alone, a digital movie poster based on the game, a digital concept poster based on The Witching Hour, access to the backers only forums, digital art book, personalized postcard, and an exclusive T-Shirt.
